title: Viewpoint on Adelaide
creator_credit: Film Australia, Don Murray and Lilias Castle
brief_description: The city of Adelaide, South Australia, as seen through the eyes of European migrants. Becoming accustomed to Australia was the main problem of migrants in this film. The language barrier, strange customs and the long hours of work required to become established are discussed.
